metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2205 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap it looks like this CVE is a typo of CVE-2022-2505

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
